item.title: Setting Up MacOS for Software Development
item.description: First Things First After frist login, run Software Update and ensure that the operating system is at the latest point of release

item.title: Samurai Jack Introduction
item.description: Long ago in a distant land, I, Aku, the shape-shifting Master of Darkness, unleashed an unspeakable evil! But a foolish Samurai warrior wielding a magic sword stepped forth to oppose me. Before the final blow was struck, I tore open a portal in time and flung him into the future, where my evil is law! Now the fool seeks to return to the past, and undo the future that is Aku!

item.title: About Dominic Motuka
item.description: Hello! I am a passionate software developer driven by the motivation to help teams achieve a common goal by leveraging technology. Currently, I’m a DevOps engineer overseeing in-house Andela software. I work in teams to establish automation pipelines, develop scripts to automate development operations, configuration management and provide actionable feedback. I am a lifelong learner and I continuously seek avenues to improve my knowledge, skills, and capabilities to both strengthen familiar skills and learn new technologies.
